page.title: 14 LORD HAM'S COURT
page.content: A local old folks home. Many local elderly people live here.They are very happy there and seem to be well cared for.There is a long waiting list.To get in when you are 80 years old you must have had your name on the list for 20 years!In the bedrooms everything is run by battery because the old people forget to switch things off.The rooms are ready furnished,but the old people can take as many of their own small posessions as they want.There are 3 T.V. rooms,one for each channel,a library and beautiful grounds.The old people can persue many hobbies such as sewing and handicrafts.They have many outings and the chapel is available to people of all religions.What a super place to spends the last days of your life.
